resources.string: LET'S GET YOU STARTED WITH YOUR NEW SURFBOARD DEVICE!
Username and password do not match any user in this service.
To install the device, we require access to a few resources on your mobile devices.
This is used during installation for access to Bluetooth and when selecting a Wi-Fi network. ARRIS does not collect and share location information with 3rd parties.
This is used to cache data to optimize the performance of the application.
This is used to allow dial access to contact customer support when needed.
Allow SBC Test to access this device's location?
User already exist with this email. Please try a different email OR press SIGN IN button to login with existing user.
I agree to the Terms and Conditions
I want to receive updates and communications from CommScope
Check your email account for the verification code and enter it here. If not found, check your Spam folder. Tap on RESEND for a new code if needed.
The code you entered is not valid. Please verify your code and try again. If needed, you can try to Resend the code.
We have sent a new verification code to the email you provided. Please check both the Inbox and Spam folders for the code and enter it to verify your account.

As added security to confirm your account, an email containing a uniquely generated code has been sent to you. Please note that this typically takes under a minute. If you have not received an email from our team, please check your Spam mail folder. If you have not received the email please try again. If you are not able to receive the email, please verify your email address or contact our support team.
Your devices will no longer be able to access this network, the Internet, or each other until Internet is restored.
Are you sure you want to do this?
